content: अतिरिच् (Gen. used in <ab>pass.</ab>) {@--1@} To surpass, excel, be superior to (with <ab>abl.</ab>); अश्वमेधसहस्रेभ्यः सत्यमेवातिरिच्यते <ls>H. 4. 131</ls>; गृहं तु गृहिणीहीनं कांतारादतिरिच्यते <ls>Pt. 4. 81</ls>; वाचः कर्मातिरिच्यते ‘example is better than precept;’ sometimes with <ab>acc.</ab>; न च नारायणोऽत्रभवंतमतिरिच्यते <ls>K. 203</ls>; or used by itself in the sense of ‘to be supreme,’ ‘prevail’, ‘triumph’, ‘predominate’, ‘be mightier’; न किंचिदतिरिच्यते <ls>Ms. 9. 296</ls> none is supreme or higher than another; <ls n="Ms.">12. 25</ls>; so दैवमत्रातिरिच्यते, स्वभावोतिरिच्यते <ls>H. 1. 17</ls>; स्वल्पमप्यतिरिच्यते <ls>H. 2</ls> is of great importance. {@--2@} To be left with a surplus, be redundant or superfluous.
